text.autoconfig.krlo.title: Kle's Render Layer Optimizer
text.autoconfig.krlo.option.masterToggle: Removes configured rendering layers to increase performance when rendering items, armor, weapons, etc.
text.autoconfig.krlo.option.categories.i: Covers general items such as books, tools, and fishing rods.
text.autoconfig.krlo.option.categories.w: Swords, tridents, bows, crossbows, axes, shields, and similar gear.
text.autoconfig.krlo.option.categories.a: Player armor, horse armor, and elytra glint.
text.autoconfig.krlo.option.categories.o: Fallback for modded items we cannot classify.
